item.description:
Come join us for some lively French conversation AND DINNER at 7:00pm at the Needham Petit Robert (http://www.petitrobertbistro.com/). We have reservations for 2 tables of 4 under Tara and Rachelle. To celebrate 3 years for the meetup, we are having a French dinner instead of meeting at Panera. There is on street parking near Petit Robert as well as a small parking lot behind a strip just past the restaurant. 

Because this is a dinner with limited space, please think carefully about your RSVP. I am capping this meetup at 8 people so to be considerate of others, please keep your rsvp updated.

If there is additional information you need about this meetup, please let me know.

Looking forward to a great meal and conversation on 12/1.

 

Tara & Rachelle
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for reservation for Tara or Rachelle

group.name: The Boston Metrowest French Language Meetup

item.name: French Meetup DINNER
